Plot: Chark, an adventurer comes to small village in the near of a gold digger's camp. He is arrested by the local police, who accuse him of having comitted a bank robbery in a neighoured town. ...
Title: Death in the Garden
Writer: Luis Alcoriza (adaptation), Luis Buñuel (adaptation), Raymond Queneau (adaptation), Raymond Queneau (dialogue), Gabriel Arout (dialogue), José-André Lacour (novel)
Actors: Simone Signoret, Charles Vanel, Georges Marchal, Michel Piccoli
